name: Outer Shoals
role_in_state: maritime hazard buffer and specialized resource zone
culture_adjustments: apprenticeship emphasizes reef-skill and shallow-water seamanship
salvage-charters and informal rights override some port guild norms
practical animist rites dominate daily working routines
more improvisational craft forms for small reef craft
constraints: hazardous approach prevents large deepwater ports
ritual-magic reliant on scarce imported reagents
notes: key calibration zone for state navigational-auguries
common source of inter-merchant salvage disputes
seasonal workforce peaks during low-wind months
